name: Feedback pointer 1
description:
Controls : 

B : reset background
S : Make the pointer bigger. 
A : make the pointer smaller. 

This is the first of a series of interactive art piece made with shaders where you can use the pointer to draw with feedback. The idea is to show different ways of how to use feedback as a creative tool. This one in particular has a displacement in the Y axis and once the drawing reach the botoom its stars over.
